__TOC__

Plugins allow you to automatically convert the Flash videos to another format after the download, or realize some other interesting action.

== Default Plugin Set ==

=== Convert to OGG ===

This plugin will convert the downloaded videos to OGG Theora, using the ffmpeg2theora application, and remove the .flv file afterwards.

'''Requirements:''' ffmpeg2theora

=== Convert to AVI ===

This plugin will convert the downloaded videos to AVI, using ffmpeg, and remove the .flv file afterwards.

'''Requirements:''' ffmpeg
